header.description: Report header scalars: reporting period dates and generation timestamp, all supplied as runtime parameters.

rows.description: One row per configured data collection job from app_jobs. Columns: name, type, status, enabled flag, polling interval in milliseconds, and CPU budget tier.

totals.description: No totals section defined for this report.

semantics: date_from and date_to are display-only label parameters â€” they are NOT used to filter rows. All jobs are listed regardless of date. generated_at is a server-side runtime injection (current datetime).
transformations: No reshape required: all row tokens map directly to columns in app_jobs with a single NONE strategy.
